blogPost.excerpt: An easy to use, privacy-focused alternative to the big analytics platforms that keeps everyone anonymous and puts you in charge. Created and hosted in the EU, powered by renewable energy.
blogPost.body: An easy to use, privacy-focused alternative to the big analytics platforms that keeps everyone anonymous and puts you in charge. Created and hosted in the EU, powered by renewable energy.
blogPost.title: Microanalytics.io - Privacy-focussed alternative to the big analytics platforms.
blogPost.author: Andrew Jackson

localize.description: 一个易于使用，注重隐私的替代方案，可以让每个人都匿名，让你负责。在欧盟创建和托管，由可再生能源提供动力。
localize.tagline: 注重隐私的大分析平台的替代品。

localize.description: 一個易於使用，注重隱私的替代方案，可以讓每個人都匿名，讓你負責。在歐盟創建和託管，由可再生能源提供動力。
localize.tagline: 注重隱私的大分析平臺的替代品。

previous.excerpt: Build an admin panel for your Rails application in a minute. No code, no hassle — save time and money by trying Forest Admin for free.
previous.title: Forest Admin for Rails - Fully-featured admin panel for Ruby on Rails apps

localize.description: 在一分钟内为您的Rails应用程序建立一个管理面板。没有代码，没有麻烦--免费试用Forest Admin，节省时间和金钱。
localize.tagline: 为Ruby on Rails应用程序提供功能齐全的管理面板。

localize.description: 在一分鐘內爲您的Rails應用程序建立一個管理面板。沒有代碼，沒有麻煩--免費試用Forest Admin，節省時間和金錢。
localize.tagline: 爲Ruby on Rails應用程序提供功能齊全的管理面板。

next.excerpt: Chatwoot is an open-source omnichannel communication platform built as an alternative to Intercom, Zendesk etc. Chatwoot helps you to connect email, website live chat, social media handles, WhatsApp etc. and manage all your customer interactions from one place.
next.title: Chatwoot - Open-source customer communication platform

localize.description: Chatwoot是一个开源的全渠道沟通平台，作为Intercom、Zendesk等的替代品。Chatwoot可以帮助你连接电子邮件、网站即时聊天、社交媒体手柄、WhatsApp等，从一个地方管理所有的客户互动。
Chatwoot是一個開源的全渠道溝通平臺，作爲Intercom、Zendesk等的替代品。Chatwoot可以幫助你連接電子郵件、網站即時聊天、社交媒體手柄、WhatsApp等，從一個地方管理所有的客戶互動。
